All Classes

Class Description
ChatApplicationServerEngine
ChatApplicationServerEngine class is responsible for providing the appropriate interface in order for the system to correctly start up and shut down all the necessary components.
ChatApplicationServerPropertiesLoader
This class file is responsible for loading all configuration properties defined in the chatapplication-server.properties file stored in the "dist" folder of the ChatApplicationServer project.
ChatMessage
This class defines the different type of messages that will be exchanged between the Clients and the Server.
ClientEngine  
ClientSocketGUI  
ComponentInitException
This kind of exception is thrown whenever a ChatApplication system component fails to initialize correctly.
ComponentManager
The component manager handles the starting and stopping of all system components.
ConfigManager
The ConfigManager components manages configuration values in the format [key, value].
GenericThreadedComponent
This class serves as the basis for a multithreaded component that does NOT receive any network messages.
IComponent
This interface is supported by all ChatApplication components that support automatic start-up and shut down by the Component Manager.
ListenFromServer  
P2PClient  
PropertyLoadException
This kind of exception is thrown whenever an attempt to load an invalid configuration property given by the user when booting up the ChatApplication Server side.
ServerStatistics
This class is just an auxiliary class for logging functionalities.
SocketConnectionHandler  
SocketServerEngine  
SocketServerGUI
